page.title: 08HERMITAGE SCHOOL FETE
page.content: The Parent Teacher Association organizes a fete at the school every year. The PTA is an association where parents and teachers join together to raise money to buy things for the school. A fete is when lots of people come to enjoy themselves and look at the displays and stalls, and buy things like plants, books and games. There is a rainbow stall which contains lots of different coloured items. A tombola is where you can win bottles of drink and cans of food. There is also a refreshment tent where you can go and buy drinks, cakes and ice-creams. One of the main attractions is the aerial ropeway. You shoot down a rope which is supported by a pulley. There are displays like remote control helicopters,judo,Morris dancing, disco dancing and a football tournament.
